package_name: Budapest: The Pearl of the Danube
region_description: Budapest, the capital of Hungary, is a stunning city split by the Danube River into two parts: Buda and Pest. Known for its grand architecture, thermal baths, and vibrant nightlife, Budapest offers visitors a rich cultural experience. The city is home to iconic landmarks such as the Buda Castle, Fisherman's Bastion, and the Hungarian Parliament Building. Budapest's famous thermal baths, like Széchenyi and Gellért, provide relaxation in a historic setting. With its unique blend of history, culture, and modernity, Budapest is a must-visit destination.

places_to_visit.name: Buda Castle
places_to_visit.description: Buda Castle is a historical castle and palace complex that houses the Hungarian National Gallery and the Budapest History Museum, offering stunning views of the city.

places_to_visit.name: Fisherman's Bastion
places_to_visit.description: Fisherman's Bastion is a picturesque terrace with neo-Romanesque architecture, providing panoramic views of the Danube and the Parliament building.

places_to_visit.name: Hungarian Parliament Building
places_to_visit.description: The Hungarian Parliament Building is an architectural masterpiece and the largest building in Hungary, known for its stunning interior and guided tours.

places_to_visit.name: Széchenyi Thermal Bath
places_to_visit.description: Széchenyi Thermal Bath is one of the largest and most famous thermal baths in Europe, featuring numerous pools, saunas, and wellness treatments.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace
hotels.description: Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace is a luxurious hotel located by the Danube River, known for its Art Nouveau style and exceptional service.

hotels.name: Corinthia Hotel Budapest
hotels.description: Corinthia Hotel Budapest is a grand hotel offering elegant accommodations and a renowned spa in a historic building.

restaurants.name: Hungarikum Bistro
restaurants.description: Hungarikum Bistro serves traditional Hungarian cuisine in a cozy and friendly atmosphere, known for its goulash and homemade desserts.

restaurants.name: Café Gerbeaud
restaurants.description: Café Gerbeaud is a historic café famous for its pastries and cakes, offering a delightful spot for afternoon tea.
